entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -17.7°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
